title: Unlocked First Strike Icon but not skin yet
body: So what if I unlocked the First Strike Icon for Project Ekko already, but am planning on getting RP on the weekend. Will I still get the First Strike border for Project Ekko? Or no?

replies.body:
No, you won't get the First Strike border unless you own both the First Strike Icon **AND** Project Ekko before the event ends tonight. 

[Our FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/210155266-PROJECT-DISRUPTION-FAQ) goes over complete details. Let me know if you have any other questions.
